name: Mandelbulb Explorer (Alpear)
description:
This is a simple implementation of the mandlebulb fractal to test my new marching cubes system. This fractal explorer allows you to zoom in and move around. The viewer will also continuously sharpen the image if you leave it at the current location/zoom-level. The fractal is code runs on a single processor core which means the performance is complete doodoo and bottlenecks the whole thing...

I hope you can still enjoy some fun with the fractal  at least :)

Controls:

Click and hold the button with the desired effect and drag the mouse around.
There is no 'quit' button so you have to force quit it :/
